thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 7 of 150
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text:
This is my second purchase at RC Willey and I was very excited to get a new mattress set!! My delivery was early morning and the guys who delivered were so pleasant and helpful! They even let me vacuum my carpet under the bed before they placed the box spring! They also took my old set and removed it!! They were amazing!!
My new mattress is so comfortable and I got a great sleep first night. Thank you RC Willey for putting this particular mattress set on sale again. It was well worth waiting for!!
